history.action: üîç T+38H POST-IMPLEMENTATION QUALITY CHECKPOINT (C612) ‚Äî Fifth QA cycle post-npm-live. Verified quality after two major Sprint 2 PRs (C603 heat-retrieval, C609 reflexion-core).
